caption.p: Antioxidant activity of different polar and nonpolar solvent extracts of S. monoica at different concentrations (10–100 μg/ml). (A) 2-2-Diphenyl-1-picryl-hydrazyl (DPPH) free radical scavenging activity, (B) ABTS radical-scavenging ability, (C) H 2O 2 radical scavenging activity, (D) total reductive capability (E) IC 50 values of antioxidant activities of the leaves, and (F) IC 50 values of antioxidant activities of the RS extracts. The bar diagrams represent the mean ± SD ( n = 3, p < 0.05) for all tested dosages.
